bibl.title: Record of Services for Walter Reed, March 18, 1882

div1.p: The Record of Services summarizes Reed's military assignments from June 26, 1875 through March 18, 1882.

div1.head: Record of Services for Walter Reed, March 18, 1882
div1.p:
Record of the Services
AND EFFICIENCY OF
Dr. Walter Reed.

Assistant Surgeon, U.S. Army, as shown by
the records of the Surgeon General's Office.

Appointed Assistant Surgeon,
U.S. Army June 26, 1875.

On temporary duty at Willet's
Point, New York Harbor to April
1876; accompanied troops to
the Department of Arizona;
On temporary duty at Fort
Yuma, Cal., to August, 1876;
Post Surgeon Camp Lowell,
Ariz. Ter. to August, 1877; Post
Surgeon at Camp Apache,
Ariz. Ter. to May, 1880; On leave
of absence two (2) months; On
temporary duty at Creedmoor, N.Y.
to September, 1880; Post Surgeon
Fort Ontario, N.Y. to February,
1881; On duty at Fort McHenry,
Md., to May, 1881; at Washington
Barracks, D.C., to the present
time.

Assistant Surgeon General,
U. S. Army.
